import defaultLocationService from'js/defaultLocationService';import appCtxService from'js/appCtxService';import pageService from'js/page.service';import keyboardService from'js/keyboardService';import awHeaderService from'js/awHeaderService';export const intializeCommonLocation=async()=>{const normalizedStateName=defaultLocationService.normalizeStateName();const locationContext=appCtxService.getCtx('locationContext');appCtxService.updateCtx('locationContext',{'ActiveWorkspace:Location':normalizedStateName,'ActiveWorkspace:SubLocation':locationContext&&locationContext['ActiveWorkspace:SubLocation']});pageService.registerSubLocationContext();keyboardService.registerKeyDownEvent();const titles=await awHeaderService.getTitles();appCtxService.updateCtx('location.titles',titles);const availablePages=await pageService.getAvailableSubpages(null);const tabsInfo=await awHeaderService.constructTabsAndGetActiveTab(availablePages);return{subLocationTabCond:defaultLocationService.updateTabs(null),...titles,...tabsInfo};};export default{intializeCommonLocation};
